course.examples.spacesaver

Class Utility

  • java.lang.Object
    • course.examples.spacesaver.Utility

  • public class Utility
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class containing reusable and independent stateless methods to be used by other class in the package
    Created by kannanb on 3/7/2016.

        Parameters:

        maxCount - delete maxCount images from the imgList

      • calculateSpaceSaved

        public static java.lang.String calculateSpaceSaved(java.util.List<Pair> pairs)
        Method to evaluate the space saved as a result of compressed images
        Parameters:
        pairs - A list of Pair objects (containing source file and compressed image)
        Returns:
        A string containing information on space occupied by original images, compressed images and total savings

      • compressImages

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Pair> compressImages(java.util.List<java.lang.String> imgList,
                                                       int imageQuality)
        Method to compress all the images in a given list of images of desired image quality
        Parameters:
        imgList - A list of images that needs to be compressed
        imageQuality - Images to be compressed of the desired quality
        Returns:
        Returns a list of Pair objects containing path to source and compressed image

      • compressImage

        public static java.lang.String compressImage(java.lang.String imgFile,
                                             int imageQuality,
                                             java.lang.String imgFolder)
        Method to compress an image of the desired image quality and place the generated compressed image in the imgFolder
        Parameters:
        imgFile - Absolute path to image file that needs to be compressed
        imageQuality - The quality level of the compressed image
        imgFolder - Path to the location where the generated compressed image needs to be placed
        Returns:
        Absolute path to the newly generated image
